Articles.Content:
Based on what I would do for a CSGO SFM animation. Different settings and characters, of course.

Key : MMB ; Moho Millitary base

MMS ; Moho Military station

LOC : MMB

TIME : 2313 MMS AREA TIME

STATUS : SEARCHING FOR MMS. CONTACTING ANY CRAFT NEAR MOHO AND SEE IF THEY KNOW THE MMS STATUS

"MMS, MMS do you copy? DO YOU COPY?" The Com-manager shouted.

"All millitary comms in the area have been knocked out. Good thing we have civilian transmitters stored." Poc, the station commander said

LOC : MMS

TIME : 2314

STATUS : MOVING TO BOMB

"Come on come on chop chop!" Lok, commander, said. One beep per second from the bomb.

"They're on the other side of this airlock!" Five beeps per second.

"Charge in 3. 2. 1. Clatter, clack, tinkle." Atin said, unlocking the airlock.

"Shi-" One solider was destroyed by a burst of minigun fire from the first enemy. Lok threw in a grenade, killing him. Twenty beeps per second. The UKN soldiers charged in, destroying KF soldiers. Ten kerbals died in the engagment. Thirty beeps per second.

"I'll get the bomb!" Corr, bomb disposal Kerbal said. Thirty-two beeps per second. Corr started defusing.

"Isn't it two seconds with 35 bps when it blows up?" Lok said.

"Yeah." Corr said, defusing. 34 beeps per second. "What's the god **** bombs in here?" He shouted in frustration. Thirty-five.

"Oh sh** it's gonna blow!" 2.

"MMS, this is MMB are you there?" The MMB comm-manager asked. "I think we lost the MMS."

I suggest you watch the Ted Ed video about the anti-hero. Almost always in my stories, the protaganists are anti-heros.
